name: Smol Shoot
description:
CHANGE WEAPON - NUM 1 -  3

DASH - shift

RELOAD  - r

MOVE - wasd

SHOOT - mouse and stuff

THIS GAME WAS CREATED FOR THE 2ND BEN BONK GAME JAM

The game was made in 72 hours though I used a lot of assets from other projects and scripting also went by pretty fast because I  was mostly working on similar stuff lately and so kinda knew what i was doing and could reuse scripts. 

-noobies are recommended to turn off the background for easier visuals

-smash like
